name: Fiflow速 BTX
description: Fiflow速 BTX is a fully fluorinated medical grade Perfluorocarbons with an incredible capacity to carry gasses, notably Oxygen, Nitrogen and Carbon Dioxide. Fiflow速 BTX is an ideal ingredient for anti-wrinkle products as it has an instantaneous dermal filling and muscular relaxation effect. It also provides long-term effects due to its capacity to supply Oxygen to the skin. Fiflow速 products are stable, inert and heavy liquids and even the most volatile ones are safe to use as they have no flashpoint. They are not ozone depleting materials.
